Special Headers Kittipos Sirivongrungson 2022-01-16 1 Bookdown Test This is my experimental test repo for creating a bookdown website. 1.1 Usage By default, bookdown merges all Rmd files by the order of filenames, e.g., 01-intro.Rmd will appear before 02-literature.Rmd. Filenames that start with an underscore _ are skipped. If there exists an Rmd file named index.Rmd, it will always be treated as the first file when merging all Rmd files. 1.1.1 Render # bookdown::render_book(".", "bookdown::gitbook") bookdown::preview_chapter("index.Rmd") 1.1.2 Live Preview Live preview of the book can be done by bookdown::serve_book()

2 Introduction Chapter name is defined by 1st level header. 2.1 Linking A link to a chapter by a single set of square brackets [Bookdown Test]: Bookdown Test Customize Link Text To Chapter: Testing for Bookdown To ID: [Render Book][#render]
